mapper.select: SELECT fap.product_name, fap.product_regdate , fap.farm_address,fpsh.product_serial_num , Date(fpsh.sharing_date) AS sharing_date, fpsh.farmer_bank, fpsh.farmer_account, fpsh.farmer_profit AS deposit FROM farmer_profit_sharing_history AS fpsh JOIN farm_and_product fap ON fpsh.product_serial_num = fap.product_serial_num JOIN auction_history ah ON ah.product_serial_num = fpsh.product_serial_num WHERE fpsh.farmer_serial_num = #{farmer_serial_num} AND ah.auction_status = 'O' ORDER BY fpsh.sharing_date;
